item.title: The Most Visited AI Tools in 2024
item.description: Unless you’ve been in hibernation, ChatGPT has probably crossed your radar. If not, well, your well-insulated cave is due for an AI wake-up call! And in case you’re already in the know about ChatGPT, get ready to be thrilled because there’s a whole AI universe out there. Today, we’re diving into the year’s hottest AI tools that have the whole world talking! 1. ChatGPT ChatGPT is a powerful language model by OpenAI that can understand and generate human-like text, making it useful for chatbots, virtual assistants, and content generation.
